channel.title: Blogonresearch
channel.description: This is a "revival" of an old blog of mine on psychological research and methodology (hence the name *blogonreseach*). Just anything on research and methodology that are useful to me, and maybe also useful to others.

item.title: Welcome to Blogonresearch
item.dc:creator: Shu Fai Cheung
item.description: This is a "revival" of an old blog of mine on psychological research and methodology.
